metadata.title: Dangerous Threads Western Hatband Hat Band Black Leather with 10 Nickel Conchos
features: Genuine Topgrain Leather Hat band with Classic high-detail scalloped Oval Western Conchos
Sterling Silver plated 3 Piece Buckle Set
10 Quality Scalloped nickel finish conchos on Black Genuine Topgrain Leather band, Silver finish ornaments
PS: Selling hatband only, not the hat...
description: Genuine Topgrain Leather with Classic Western Conchos. Detailed Sterling Silver Plated 3 Piece Buckle Set. Total length 27"; fits any hat. This Hatband: 10 Quality Nickel Finish 1" Classic Western "Star" Conchos on Genuine Leather. Black with silver finish ornaments.   Brand New! NOT Made in China! Proudly Handcrafted in the USA by Dangerous Threads, Nashville, TN. Our 20+ years of manufacturing experience assures you Top Quality Merchandise. Regular Retail: A Whole Lot More!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "5.1 x 4.4 x 0.4 inches; 1.6 Ounces", "Department": "mens", "Date First Available": "November 26, 2011"}
